Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick passenger at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick passenger on a train at Clark/Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Dakin
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted NB: Broadway, Clarendon, Irving Park & Broadway; SB: Broadway, Irving Park, Fremont, West Sheridan & Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Broadway/Dakin.

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Clarendon, Irving Park and Broadway.

Southbound buses will operate via Broadway, Irving Park, Fremont, West Sheridan and Broadway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Broadway/Dakin
ShortDescription: WB 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Lake Shore Dr, West Sheridan, Broadway, Clarendon & Irving Pk: due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Lake Shore Drive, West Sheridan, Broadway, Clarendon and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Dakin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Luella
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted EB: 93rd, Paxton, 94th, Yates and 93rd; WB: 93rd, Yates, 92nd, Luella and 93rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Luella due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 93rd, Paxton, 94th, Yates and 93rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 93rd, Yates, 92nd, Luella and 93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Lawrence
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Broadway, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Broadway, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
